completeListOfAbilities.name: Nightmare Shot
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
5-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
All targets: 3 turns Nightmare
Self: 6 turns Implanted Power

ailments.name: Nightmare
ailments.desc: Nightmare: Lowers DEF; effects a certain amount of BRV damage

ailments.name: Implanted Power
ailments.desc: Implanted Power: Raises MAX BRV; deals greater BRV damage based on number of debuffs afflicting target

completeListOfAbilities.name: Deadly Beast Flare
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit group 火 ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
All targets: 4 turns INT BRV Down III、 火 Resist Down
Self: 8 turns 火 Enchant
High turn rate
Deadly Beast Flare becomes Deadly Beast Flare+ (4-hit group 火 ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; all targets: 4 turns INT BRV Down III、 火 Resist Down; self: 8 turns 火 Enchant; high turn rate) while target afflicted with 3 or more debuffs

passives.name: Rapid Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 1 turn upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Rapid Speed: Raises SPD

passives.name: Mighty Beast Flare
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Deadly Beast Flare、 Deadly Beast Flare+
passives.short_desc: Mighty Beast Flare: Increases BRV damage dealt with Deadly Beast Flare、 Deadly Beast Flare+

passives.name: Charged Beast Flare
passives.desc: Deadly Beast Flare use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Beast Flare: Raises use count of Beast Flare

passives.name: Mighty Livewire Shot
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Livewire Shot、 Livewire Shot+
passives.short_desc: Mighty Livewire Shot: Increases BRV damage dealt with Livewire Shot、 Livewire Shot+

passives.name: All Break Boost Up
passives.desc: Marginally raises party's Break Bonus upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: All Break Boost Up: Raises party's Break Bonus

passives.name: Charged Livewire Shot
passives.desc: Livewire Shot use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Livewire Shot: Raises use count of Livewire Shot

passives.name: Debuff Attack Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK when an enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: Debuff Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Bravery Critical Hit
passives.desc: Slightly raises BRV upon unleashing a critical BRV attack
passives.short_desc: Bravery Critical Hit: Gains BRV

passives.name: Turk of Turks
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV、 ATK、 DEF while own HP is less than 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: Turk of Turks: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV、 ATK、 DEF

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Beast Flare Extension
passives.desc:
Deadly Beast Flare use +1

When using Deadly Beast Flare:
 • Becomes group attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight INT BRV Down boost
 • 火 Enchant duration +4
 • Higher turn rate
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

Deadly Beast Flare becomes Deadly Beast Flare+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%) while target afflicted with 3 or more debuffs
passives.short_desc: Beast Flare Extension: Boost to Deadly Beast Flare

passives.name: Debuff Attack Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK while enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: Debuff Attack Boost: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Livewire Shot Extension
passives.desc:
Livewire Shot use +3

When using Livewire Shot:
 • Becomes group attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

Livewire Shot becomes Livewire Shot+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%) while target afflicted with 3 or more debuffs

When using BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
passives.short_desc: Livewire Shot Extension: Boost to Livewire Shot

passives.name: Destruction Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Resonance: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Debuff Act Longer Extension
passives.desc: When using Debuff Act Longer:\n • Adds 1 turn to inflicted debuff duration\n • Adds effect that slightly raises party's stolen BRV limit
passives.short_desc: Debuff Act Longer Extension: Boost to Debuff Act Longer

passive.name: Debuff Act Longer Growth
passive.desc: Debuff Act Longer use +1\n\nDebuff Act Longer effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Debuff Act Longer Growth: Boost to Debuff Act Longer

passive.name: Full HP Critical Attack Down
passive.desc: Inflicts ATK Down 30% for 6 turns when dealing critical hit while HP at MAX
passive.short_desc: Full HP Critical Attack Down: Inflicts ATK Down when dealing critical hit

passive.name: Inner Beast
passive.desc: When using Deadly Beast Flare、 Deadly Beast Flare+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • INT BRV Down boost、 duration+
passive.short_desc: Inner Beast: Boost to Deadly Beast Flare

passive.name: Lightning Unleashed
passive.desc:
When using Livewire Shot、 Livewire Shot+:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Turn rate+
 • ATK Down boost、 duration+
 • MAX BRV Up boost、 duration+
 • 雷 Enchant duration+

While 雷 Enchant active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+
 • High turn rate
passive.short_desc: Lightning Unleashed: Boost to Livewire Shot

passive.name: Waking from a Long Slumber
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Nightmare Shot
passive.short_desc: May equip EX ability Nightmare Shot

passives.name: Mighty Nightmare Shot
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Nightmare Shot
passives.short_desc: Mighty Nightmare Shot: Increases BRV damage dealt with Nightmare Shot

passives.name: Nightmare Shot Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Nightmare Shot
passives.short_desc: Nightmare Shot Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Nightmare Shot

passives.name: Waking from a Long Slumber Attack Up+
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Hell's Lore (VII) or passive ability Waking from a Long Slumber:\n • Slightly raises ATK\n • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Waking from a Long Slumber Attack Up+: Raises ATK; enables HP Attack+

passive.name: Waking from a Long Slumber Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Nightmare Shot
passive.short_desc: Waking from a Long Slumber Extension: Boost to Nightmare Shot

passives.name: Beast Flare & Livewire Shot Buff Starting
passives.desc: 8 turns 火 Enchant、 雷 Enchant、 MAX BRV Up II at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Beast Flare & Livewire Shot Buff Starting: 火 Enchant、 雷 Enchant、 MAX BRV Up II at start of quest

passives.name: Waking from a Long Slumber Extension Boost
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Hell's Lore (VII)+ or passive ability Waking from a Long Slumber Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Waking from a Long Slumber Extension Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Nightmare Shot Group BRV Hit
passives.desc:
When using Nightmare Shot:
 • BRV attack becomes group attack

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (group BRV attack)
passives.short_desc: Nightmare Shot Group BRV Hit: Group BRV attacks with Nightmare Shot、 HP Attack++

passives.name: Nightmare Shot Advance
passives.desc: Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Nightmare Shot
passives.short_desc: Nightmare Shot Advance: Boost to Nightmare Shot
